title: CCC highlights cost-effectiveness of wind energy in driving down electricity bills (RenewableUK)
text: ( Source : RenewableUK) 22 October 2015 RenewableUK says today's report by the Committee on Climate Change makes a strong case for ramping up the deployment of wind, wave and tidal energy, and investing in it as a national priority. The CCC 's
